* Desmonus hissed as a piece of shuttle flew just by her head, squishing 
herself against the ground as close as she could.
She was so close to her prey too, just a few more lengths and she could have 
had him.
< Blast those Maximals!>
If it was up to her she'de slag them all and drain the mech-fluid from their 
veins to feed upon.
Coughing while ash rose she backed off from her current position and hissed 
before moving away from the growing cloud. But there was no escaping and she 
flung herself into the air, beating her wings quickly before transforming 
into robot mode, keeping herself severel feet above the ground and flapping 
enough to keep the ash away.
Keeping one hand over her mouth she continued to flap even while the air 
around her became clear, moving back slowly so that she might have a hope of 
backing away from this death trap. Though...it kept the sun off her nicely.*
